item.title: Hello World!
item.author: Amirreza Ghaderi
item.description:
Hello there,

My name is Amirreza Ghaderi. I’m a software developer.

As the title would suggest, it’s my first post on this blog. I started this blog simply because i like to write. it helps me to keep my mind clear; I’m one of those people who always keeps a pen and paper around. Its not easy for me to understand or think about something, unless i write it down. It also feels good to share your knowledge with others!

I blogged for many years but this is my first attempt to writing a blog in English—which is not my first language. This blog will be mostly about software development or any other subject that captures my interest along the way.

p.s. I will probably going to use this post as my “About” page. :)
